synopsis.text:
Umisho's swimming club is in for a splash of excitement when Kaname Okiura, a second-year student, joins as their manager. Despite his inability to swim and a deep-seated fear of water, Kaname is determined to conquer his aquaphobia. But the club is far from ordinary, filled with eccentric members who are anything but conventional swimming instructors.

Enter Amuro Ninagawa, a vibrant transfer student from Okinawa, who turns the club upside down with her unconventional swimming style and extraordinary underwater agility. Reminiscent of a mermaid, she leaves the club members awestruck, especially Kaname, who can't shake off the feeling that he's seen her before. As it turns out, Amuro's arrival triggers a childhood memory of Kaname's near-drowning experience, where he believed a mermaid had pulled him underwater.

As if Amuro's presence wasn't enough to shake things up, her floating house is destroyed in a storm, leading her to move in with Kaname. With Amuro's magnetic personality and penchant for nude swimming, life under one roof promises to be anything but dull. Will Kaname finally overcome his fear of water, or will Amuro's arrival only complicate matters further? Join the Umisho swimming club for an unforgettable adventure filled with laughter, friendship, and a touch of the extraordinary.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
